module.name: ap210_product_rule
module.keywords: module, rule system, rule management, rule attributes, rule representation, rule set, rule grouping

purpose.p: This part of ISO 10303 specifies an application module for the representation of product rules, commonly known as design rules. This data includes support for rule creation, management, assignment to product data or features, assignment to product or requirement parameters. Complete use of this capability requires use of external definition for the expressions. Configuration management information and design management information is provided.
